items.title: Trump asks Supreme Court to quickly hear appeal to save his tariffs
items.description: The fate of most of President Trump's tariffs are at stake in the appeal, which seeks to overturn lower-court rulings finding he usurped Congress' aut...

items.title: Judge voids $2.2 billion Harvard funding freeze by Trump administration
items.description: The Trump administration in April froze grants to Harvard University over concerns about antisemitism on the Ivy League campus and other concerns.

items.title: Congress races to avoid government shutdown as partisan standoff deepens
items.description: Lawmakers returned to Capitol Hill this week with the threat of a government shutdown intensifying. Partisan fault lines are already solidified.

items.title: Ban on congressional stock ownership gains momentum with new bill
items.description: A ban on congressional stock trades is gaining momentum after a bipartisan group of lawmakers have unified around a single proposal.
